page.title: 05Much Wenlock Parish Church-1
page.content: Most of the{Parish Church}dates back to{Norman}times. Some parts of the church are{older-1300 years old,}and other parts are{newer-600 years old. The church has 8 bells. The{Reverend Grundy}is the clergyman at the Parish Church. There are also{3 {other ministers-1 lady and 3 gentlemen who preach and, with Reverend Grundy, preach at other churches in the area. On{Sunday}there are two services. The {service at 11:00a.m.}is sometimes a {Communion service,}or a{Family service when children take part, or{Matins. There is sometimes an{evening service. About 60 people attend the morning service and about 20 in the evening. Every{Friday at 9:30a.m.}there is a {Communion service,}which is attended by about 20 people, who are mainly elderly.
